summary: An aging martial arts expert is gifted a plaque from the Emperor declaring him the Kung Fu World Champion. Unsure of whether or not be is deserving of this title, he embarks on a journey to defeat the 7 Grandmasters.
cast: Yi-Min Li|Jack Long|Kuan-Wu Lung|Nancy Yen|Chung-Hsing Chao|Chin-Hai Chen|Chiu Chen|Ching-Feng Chiang|Yuet-Sang Chin|Alan Chung San Chui|Wang Hsiao|Kuang Hu|Heng Li|Hsiao-Fei Li|Hsin Hua Li|Yi-hsing Li|Fei Lung|Chin Ku Ma|Ching-Shun Mao|Kuo-Liang Su|Chi-yen Wang|Fan Wang|Kai Wang|Hsiao-Hui Wu|Hua-Hua Wu|Te-Shan Wu|Corey Yuen|Shen Yuen
keywords: kung fu|martial arts|fighting|kung fu classic|cult film
title: Jue quan
